verifyEmail.title: Verify Your Email
verifyEmail.tagline: Please verify your email address to continue
verifyEmail.verifyingText: Please wait while we verify your email address.
verifyEmail.verificationSent: We've sent a verification link to your email address.

verifyEmail.step2: Click the link to verify your account

verifyEmail.successMessage: Email verified successfully! You can now sign in.
verifyEmail.tokenExpiredMessage: Your verification link has expired. Please request a new one.
verifyEmail.genericError: Failed to verify email. Please try again.
verifyEmail.errorMessage: We couldn't verify your email. Please try again later.
verifyEmail.reason2: The token is invalid or already used
verifyEmail.reason3: There was a temporary server issue

success.seoDescription: Your email has been successfully verified for your DentalKit account

success.step1: You can now sign in to your account
success.step2: Complete your profile for a better experience

expired.seoDescription: Your email verification link has expired. Please request a new one.

error.seoDescription: There was an error verifying your email. Please try again.

verifyEmailSent.checkSpam: Don't forget to check your spam folder.
verifyEmailSent.noEmail: Missing email address. Please go back and enter your email.
verifyEmailSent.resendError: Failed to resend verification email. Please try again.

email.invalid: Please enter a valid email address

firstName.min: First name must be at least 2 characters
firstName.max: First name must be less than 50 characters

lastName.min: Last name must be at least 2 characters
lastName.max: Last name must be less than 50 characters

phone.invalid: Please enter a valid phone number

company.max: Company name must be less than 100 characters

university.max: University name must be less than 100 characters

password.min: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.tooLong: Password must be less than 128 characters
password.lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.number: Password must contain at least one number
password.symbol: Password must contain at least one special character
password.special: Password must contain at least one special character

consent.required: You must agree to the terms and conditions

validation.allFieldsRequired: All required fields must be filled

mfaCode.numeric: Authentication code must contain only numbers
